page.title: 07SOUTHWAY SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: Southway Precinct is our nearest out of town shopping centre.There is a supermarket with separate greengrocery, a baker, a fish and chip shop, a DIY store, a betting shop, a florist, a mens and womens hairdresser,a chemist, a newsagent, a post office which sells wool and baby clothes, 3 banks and library. It has a free car park, and a regular bus service to and from Plymouth passes the precinct every 20 miniutes.Right next to the Precinct there is the church of the Holy Spirit. There is also a denist and a doctor nearby.We prepared a questionnaire about the precinct and went there one morning. We asked 50 people what they thought of the centre and why they shopped there.The results are on the next page.
